message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're looking to negotiate, Bob. However, I have to consider the value of the product to me as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1600000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $1500000, but no higher. I believe that's a fair price for the product.
